name: Fable Before Apocalyse
description:
Friends till the end.

A game(powerpoint) about zombies. friendship and acceptance.

I made a visual novel for group presentation and I figured I'd upload it here :)

Play time should be around 20 minutes

ppt link if you don't want to download: https://1drv.ms/p/s!AuVsVmiTnYK5hxQ1iR6PDogNrNOQ?e=1drAYL
